REUTERS.UNKNOWN: F f0827 reute h f BC-HUNT-BUILDING-CORP-GE 03-05 0050

TEXT.TITLE: HUNT BUILDING CORP GETS NAVY CONTRACT
TEXT.BODY: Hunt Building Corp of El Paso, Texas, has received a 31.7 mln dlr contract for construction of 492 family housing units and a 75-space mobile home park at the Marine Corps combat training center at Camp Pendleton, Calif., the Navy said. REUTER
